ii. Is the actual length of the rod greater than or less than <math alttext="1.0 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>?___ Less than ___ Greater than ___ Not enough information to determineBriefly justify your answer.
